TopicTitle: Launch Button Becomes Unresponsive in VAB after editing wings

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win11 | CPU: I7 12700F | GPU: RTX 4090 | RAM: 32GB DDR4 3200mhz

 

After adjusting the stabilisation winglets or control surfaces sizes, the launch button becomes unresponsive. 
 

Can be worked around by waiting a long time. Sometimes allows launch again. 
alternative option is to save craft, exit VAB and reload craft directly to launch site. 

 

Edited December 21, 2023 by The Space Peacock

Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: windows 10 | CPU: i7 | GPU: nvidia 2080 | RAM: 80gb

Description 
When editing wings sometimes i forget to close the wings editor as it gets hidden behind other ui elements,  when this occurs if i hit th launch button it breaks the functionality of the button such that if I close the wings editor and try to launch from VAB again it will ignore the button presses.

Steps to Reproduce

1. Place wings on a rocket
2. Open wings shape Editor
3. Hit Launch Button
4. Close Wings Shape Editor
5. Hit Launch Button 

Included Attachments:
I don't always see this on wings, I mostly see this when placing a control surface. Not sure if there's something different about how they work.
